Name: Phoenix Hawk PXH-1
Details: One of the most widely used medium 'Mechs, the Phoenix Hawk PXH-1 is equipped for any type of engagements, while possessing superior jump jets that allow it to outmaneuver its opponents and hit them with its Large Laser at an range. This Periphery variant downgrades the engine in order to mount an LRM-10 rack on the left torso and an additional heat sink, while keeping the large laser and downgrading one of the medium lasers to a small one.
